ACCELERATION_FACTOR - Static variable in interface fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.GlobalSimulationConfigurationI
acceleration factor for the real time simulation; with a factor 2.0, the simulation runs two times faster than real time i.e., a run that is supposed to take 10 seconds in real time will take 5 seconds to execute.

AstronomicalSunRiseAndSetModel - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.solar_panel.mil
The class AstronomicalSunRiseAndSetModel models the sunrises and sunsets as events which times of occurrence are computed from actual positions on earth and actual days.
AstronomicalSunRiseAndSetModel(String, TimeUnit, AtomicSimulatorI) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.solar_panel.mil.AstronomicalSunRiseAndSetModel
create an atomic simulation model with the given URI (if null, one will be generated) and to be run by the given simulator using the given time unit for its clock.
